definition: place/location/spot/point/office/department/bureau/respect/classifier for locations or items of damage: spot, point
to reside/to live/to dwell/to be in/to be situated at/to stay/to get along with/to be in a position of/to deal with/to discipline/to punish

pinyin: ren2 sheng1 he2 chu4 bu4 xiang1 feng2

definition: there are plenty more fish in the sea (idiom)
pinyin: tian1 ya2 he2 chu4 wu2 fang1 cao3

sentences.english: Now let's look at examples of where AOP can be -- and is -- used.
sentences.chinese: 現在讓我們來看看AOP可以在何處使用的一個實例。

sentences.english: Just where do the politics of IT workers lie?
sentences.chinese: 政治職業IT工作者的謊言來自何處？

sentences.english: The DM decides where the combatants are positioned on the battle grid.
sentences.chinese: 由DM決定參戰者位在戰鬥方格的何處。

sentences.english: Where can I find job opportunities at WHO?
sentences.chinese: 何處可查閱世衛組織的工作機會？

sentences.english: Where will my dreaming soul tonight be found?
Similarly, producers are not aware of where their published messages are sent.
sentences.chinese: 同樣，生產者也不會知道他們發佈的消息被髮往何處。

sentences.english: As if unsure of where he is, she hesitated and looked around.
sentences.chinese: 她彷彿茫然不知聲身在何處，猶豫地向四周打量。

sentences.english: I wish you all, wherever you may be, a very happy Christmas.
sentences.chinese: 不論你們現時身在何處，我都祝願你們聖誕快樂。

sentences.english: But where are those hunting grounds?
sentences.chinese: 但是狩獵場又在何處呢？

sentences.english: Is this true and false happy of the net contend for whereto ?
sentences.chinese: 這場真假開心網之爭向何處去？

sentences.english: Also the method of descent should be clearly stated where lower-offs are not provided.
sentences.chinese: 同時，對下降方式的說明中須著明何處未設下降點。

sentences.english: Secondly, where the behavior itself occurs.
sentences.chinese: 第二，行爲又是在何處發生。

sentences.english: Where dost thou stand behind them all, my lover, hiding thyself in the shadows?
sentences.chinese: 我的情人，你站在大家背後，藏在何處的陰影中呢？

sentences.english: Never forget where you came from.
sentences.chinese: 永遠不要忘記你從何處來。

sentences.english: As if unsure of where she was, she hesitated and looked around.
sentences.chinese: 她彷彿茫然不知身在何處，猶猶豫豫向四周看。

sentences.english: And our roots are our history - not knowing our history is not knowing where our roots are.
sentences.chinese: 不學點歷史知識，怎麼知道根在何處？

definition: the world of mortals (Buddhism)/human society/worldly affairs

to return/to go back to/to give back to/(of a responsibility) to be taken care of by/to belong to/to gather together/(used between two identical verbs) despite/to marry (of a woman) (old)/division on the abacus with a one-digit divisor
foreign land/away from one's native place
old variant of 愷|恺[kai3]/old variant of 凱|凯[kai3]
to toss about in bed/from person to person/indirectly/to wander
bosom/heart/mind/to think of/to harbor in one's mind/to conceive (a child)
to stop/to cease/to dismiss/to suspend/to quit/to finish
